short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A thin-client web-based interactive develoment environment for interacting with remote file systems

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nodedit is a lightweight thin-client IDE that works on the client-server model. After installing the Nodedit-Server (available at http://www.nodedit.com) the client then connects to the remote filesystem and allows you to work with and modify the file system.
